whowearetext: The CliniCall Limited is to provide a comprehensive digital health solutions that integrates various health care services and connects patients to Online doctor BD. The company aims to empower everyone with easy access to online health services, improve communication between patients and medical professionals, and enhance the overall health care experience.
telemedicine_services: <bold>Telemedicine service in Bangladesh : </bold> Direct consultation with Online Doctor BD via online video and audio calls.
hospital_cashback: <bold>Hospital Cashback : </bold> Up to BDT 2,00,000 cashback for Clinical Health Package members to reduce medical expenses.
medicine_delivery: <bold>Online Medicine Delivery : </bold> Order medicines online and get them delivered to your doorstep.
lab_test: <bold>Lab Test : </bold> Easily book lab tests online with home sample collection.

client_blog.title: Meet Dr. Tamanna Tabassum, our dedicated Clinical Manager, who works tirelessly every day to care for our patients.
client_blog.description: Take a glimpse into the CliniCall family! Meet Dr Tamanna Tabassum, clinical manager, as she shares her insights and experiences about working in an environment dedicated to making health care accessible to all. Stay tuned for more behind-the-scenes stories!

cliniCall.title: CliniCall - Best Online Medical Doctor Consultation in BD
cliniCall.description: CliniCall is a leading telemedicine service in bangladesh the best <bold> online doctor consultation in BD. </bold> Our user-friendly platform allows you to access a wide range of medical services, including immediate consultations, specialized appointments, health packages and more. Whether you need a quick medical consultation or an in-depth specialist consultation for your health, CliniCall offers flexibility and convenience through both 24/7 online doctor Bangladesh.

doctorConsultation.title: Comprehensive Online Health Care services
doctorConsultation.description: CliniCall offers an extensive range of online health services to cater to various health care needs. Our platform allows you to consult bd online doctor for:

immediateConsultations.title: Immediate Consultations :
immediateConsultations.description: 24/7 online doctor Bangladesh, Call a doctor directly for urgent medical advice without scheduling an appointment.

specializedAppointments.title: Specialized Appointments :
specializedAppointments.description: Book an Online medical doctor consultation from our specialized doctor list to get detailed medical advice and treatment.

cliniCallDescription.text: Our health service in Bangladesh is accessible from anywhere, ensuring that you can connect with health care professionals no matter where you are. CliniCall’s telemedicine services provide not only doctor live chat but also doctor <bold> video call and audio call consultations</bold>, ensuring you receive the care you need.

healthPackage.description: CliniCall’s online health care services are designed to offer more than just <bold> unlimited online doctor consultations.</bold> Each package includes a range of additional health services, including :

telemedicine1.title: Benefits of telemedicine service in bangladesh
telemedicine1.description: <bold> Telemedicine </bold> is transforming online health care services in Bangladesh, particularly in areas where access to medical facilities can be challenging. CliniCall’s <bold> telemedicine services </bold> make it easy to receive quality care from anywhere in the country, without the need for physical clinic visits. Our platform ensures immediate access to medical professionals and continuous care through our comprehensive health packages.

whyChooseCliniCall.title: Why Choose CliniCall
whyChooseCliniCall.description: CliniCall Limited is the only platform where a doctor picks up your call directly, providing real-time consultation whenever you need it. We understand your time is valuable, so we've designed our service to offer quick, direct access to medical expertise. Along with personalized care, you’ll also enjoy top-tier health insurance packages, exclusive discounts on diagnostics, convenient medicine delivery, and at-home lab tests. With CliniCall Limited, your health and convenience are always our top priority.
whyChooseCliniCall.followUp: We also offer personalized follow-up care to continue supporting you after your consultations.
whyChooseCliniCall.contactInfo: about how CliniCall can support your health care needs and contact us here for further information about our services.

clinicallhomeDescription: CliniCall is committed to delivering the best <bold> online doctor consultation in Bangladesh </bold> with a comprehensive range of services. From immediate consultations to specialized care and extensive online health care services, CliniCall ensures that you have access to high-quality health care from the comfort of your home. Explore our packages and services today, and take the first step towards better health with CliniCall.
telemedicineTitle: • Improve patient access to health care, telemedicine, and smart health :
telemedicineDescription: Provide a user-friendly platform that enables smooth interactions between patients and medical professionals for follow-up treatment, prescriptions, consultations, and scheduling appointments with specialists.
financialDescription: Provide hospitalisation cashback to patients to lessen their financial strain and lower the cost of high-quality medical care.
medicineDescription: Make sure that patients receive their prescriptions on time and accurately, improving convenience and treatment plan adherence.
whoWeAreText: Your who we are text in English
diagnostic_description: Facilitate simple lab test scheduling and processing with prompt, accurate findings, encouraging preventative health care.
long_term_description: To guarantee long-term survival and ongoing enhancement of health care services, concentrate on sustainable business practices and financial growth.
wwdobjective: By adhering to these objectives, Clinical Limited aims to provide a holistic and efficient smart health care solution that improves patient outcomes, enhances accessibility and affordability, and supports a high standard of medical care and service delivery.
objective_description: Our objective is to revolutionize smart health care in Bangladesh by developing a comprehensive, technologically advanced platform that ensures universal access to high-quality health care services. CliniCall Limited aims to be a key player in building a Smart Bangladesh, where every citizen can achieve optimal health and well-being through innovative, accessible, and affordable health care solutions.
mission_text: To collaboratively create a smart health ecosystem that leverages digital innovation and smart technologies to provide comprehensive, accessible, and affordable health care solutions for all citizens of Bangladesh.
vision_text: Our vision is to be a pioneering health tech company that transforms the health care landscape in Bangladesh by integrating advanced digital technologies, and empower every citizen with the tools and resources they need to achieve optimal health and well-being, thereby supporting the national objective of creating a Digital Bangladesh.

doctorConsultationText: Online Medical Doctor Consultation & Appointments from Specialized Doctor List
doctorDescription: At <bold> CliniCall Limited </bold> we’re committed to making online health services easier and more convenient for you. Whether you need a quick digital health solutions or a specialist appointment, we’ve got you covered. With our <bold> online doctor appointment </bold> service, you can talk to a doctor from anywhere, anytime. Plus, if you’ve purchased one of our exclusive <bold> health packages </bold>you get 24/7 unlimited doctor consultation and more!
directDoctorAccess: Direct Doctor Access with online health services
healthPackageDescription: When you buy any of our <bold>health packages,</bold> you get the added convenience of <bold>directly calling</bold> a doctor without any hassle. No need to wait for an appointment—just call and get instant medical advice. This feature is designed for those times when you need immediate help but don’t want to go through the usual process of booking and waiting.
specialistAppointment: Online Specialist Doctor Appointments at Your Fingertips
specialist_info: In addition to general online medical doctor consultation,<bold> CliniCall</bold> also offers <bold>  specialist appointments. </bold> If you need to see a specialist—whether it’s a cardiologist, dermatologist, or any other expert—you can book an appointment through our platform. It’s fast, easy, and ensures you get the specialized care you need without any delays.
instantDoctorAccess: <bold>Instant Doctor Access :</bold> Purchase any of our health packages and enjoy direct access to a doctor over the phone, whenever you need it.
specialist_booking: <bold>  Easy Specialist Booking : </bold> Whether it’s a general consultation or a specialist appointment, you can book it effortlessly through our app or website.
convenience: <bold> Convenience :</bold> Skip the long waits and travel—get the care you need right from your home.
affordable_packages: <bold>Affordable Packages :</bold> Our health packages are designed to give you the best value, combining <bold>online doctor help, specialist care, hospital cashback</bold> and <bold>OPD services.</bold> These packages are designed to provide comprehensive health care at competitive prices, ensuring you get the best care without breaking the bank.
how_to_get_started_description: It’s easy to begin using <bold>CliniCall.</bold> Simply purchase one of our health packages, and you’ll gain immediate access to direct doctor calls. You can also book specialist appointments without a health package. You can book 24/7 Online doctor Bangladesh.
clinicall_promise: At <bold>CliniCall,</bold> we’re here to ensure your health care journey is as smooth and hassle-free as possible. <bold>Book your online doctor appointment</bold> or specialist consultation today and experience the future of digital health solutions!
lab_test_booking: Online Medical Lab Test: Quick, Easy, and Hassle-Free with CliniCall
labTestBookingdescription: At <bold>CliniCall</bold>, we’ve made <bold>lab test online booking</bold> simpler than ever. Why go through the hassle of visiting a lab when you can book your tests from the comfort of your home or office? With just a few clicks, you can easily schedule your test, and we’ll handle the rest.
why_choose_online_booking: Why Choose CliniCall’s Lab Test Online Booking?

online_medicine: Online Medicine Home Delivery with CliniCall
cliniCall_medicine_text: At <bold> CliniCall,</bold> we’re making medicine shopping easier than ever! Our <bold> online medicine home delivery service </bold> ensures that you get your essential medicines delivered right to your doorstep—whether you're in Dhaka or Chittagong. Forget the hassle of visiting pharmacies, now with just a few clicks, your medicines will come to you quickly, reliably, and at affordable prices.
choose_online_medicine_delivery: Why Choose CliniCall’s Online Medicine Home Delivery Service?
ultimate_convenience: <bold> Ultimate Convenience : </bold> Skip the long queues and pharmacy trips. Place your order from the comfort of your home or office, and we’ll handle the rest.
fast_reliable_delivery: <bold>Fast & Reliable Delivery : </bold> Our <bold>online medicine home delivery</bold> service covers both Dhaka and Chittagong, ensuring your medicines arrive on time when you need them the most.
extensive_range_of_medicines: <bold>Extensive Range of Medicines : </bold> From prescription drugs to over-the-counter medicines, CliniCall offers a wide variety of products to meet all your health care needs.
affordable_prices: <bold>Affordable Prices : </bold> Not only do we deliver right to your door, but we also offer competitive pricing, making health care more accessible and convenient for you.
order_online: <bold>1. Order Online :</bold> Visit our app or website to easily select the medicines you need. Our simple process ensures a smooth and quick experience.
home_delivery: <bold>1. Home Delivery :</bold> Once you place your order, we take care of the rest. Whether you're at home or in the office, we deliver your medicines quickly across Dhaka and Chittagong.
customer_support: <bold>3. Customer Support:</bold> Have questions? Our friendly customer support team is ready to assist you at any stage of the process.
online_medicine_home_delivery: With <bold>CliniCall's online medicine home delivery</bold>, getting the medicines you need has never been easier. Whether you're in Dhaka or Chittagong, we’re here to provide you with fast, reliable service at the best prices.
order_now_convenience: Order now and enjoy the ultimate convenience of <bold>online medicine home delivery</bold> with CliniCall!

undptitle: Swapno Project 2 : CliniCall’s Leadership in Digital Micro-Insurance
undpdescription:
Supported by UNDP and implemented by Pragati Life Insurance PLC, Swapno Project 2 brings digital micro-insurance to marginalized communities. CliniCall Limited acts as the technology and telemedicine partner, enabling cashless healthcare through QR-enabled smart cards at authorized pharmacies and clinics.

Feature phone users consult doctors via a toll-free hotline, while smartphone users access video or audio consultations through the app. For services outside the authorized network, reimbursements are provided directly to MFS accounts.

Swapno Project 2 is more than healthcare—it is a commitment to a safer, digitally empowered future for underserved populations.

tac.title: Terms and Conditions of CliniCall Limited
tac.intro: CliniCall Limited is an innovative health technology company in Bangladesh offering telemedicine services and hospitalization cashback benefits. By using our website, mobile app, or services, you agree to these terms and conditions. Please read them carefully.
tac.section1Desc: CliniCall Limited is a digital health care platform connecting patients with licensed doctors directly. Our mission is to make health care accessible and affordable for everyone. By using our app, website, or services, you agree to abide by our policies and guidelines.
tac.telemedicineDesc: Online health consultations with licensed doctors.
tac.cashbackDesc: Financial support under specific conditions for hospital admissions.
tac.documentationDesc: Easy storage for your medical reports and prescriptions.
tac.section2Note: The availability of services may vary depending on the package or membership you choose.
tac.section3Intro: Users are required to adhere to the following responsibilities while using our platform
tac.responsibility1Desc: Accurate details are mandatory during registration.
tac.responsibility2Desc: Misuse of the platform is strictly prohibited.
tac.responsibility3Desc: Users must comply with all applicable laws and organizational regulations.
tac.section3Note: Failure to meet these responsibilities may result in necessary action from CliniCall Limited.
tac.payment1Desc: Payments can be made through bKash, Rocket, Nagad, and other digital payment systems.
tac.payment2Desc: Payments are non-refundable unless specified under special conditions.
tac.payment3Desc: Services will be activated upon successful payment.
tac.section5Intro: CliniCall Limited is committed to protecting your personal information. Our privacy policy outlines how we collect, store, and use your data.
tac.privacy1Desc: Name, phone number, email address, and medical information.
tac.privacy3Desc: Your information is safeguarded using encryption technologies.
tac.section6Intro: CliniCall Limited reserves the right to cancel user access at any time if:
tac.section6a: The user violates the terms and conditions.
tac.section6Note: Notification of cancellation will be sent via email or SMS.
tac.section7Intro: CliniCall Limited shall not be held liable for:
tac.section8Title: 8. CliniCall Limited is a health technology company that connects patients with licensed doctors through telemedicine and other digital healthcare services. We are not an insurance company.
tac.section8a: In our health packages, the insurance hospitalisation cashback benefit is provided absolutely free of charge. CliniCall does not charge clients for the insurance component; our fees cover only telemedicine services and platform usage costs.
tac.section8b: The insurance cashback benefit is arranged through our partnered insurance provider(s). CliniCall’s role is limited to facilitating healthcare access and providing the digital platform. Any insurance-related benefits, claims, or coverage are the responsibility of the respective insurance provider.
tac.section9Title: 9. CliniCall Limited is a health-tech platform that connects patients with licensed doctors through telemedicine.
tac.section9a: CliniCall does not provide any medical treatment directly.
tac.section9b: All medical advice, prescriptions, and treatment decisions are the sole responsibility of the doctor.
tac.section9c: CliniCall is not liable for the outcome of any consultation or treatment provided by the doctor.
tac.section9d: Patients are advised to follow the doctor’s instructions and seek in-person medical care if required.
tac.section10Desc: We reserve the right to update these terms and conditions at any time. Changes will take effect once posted on our website or app.
tac.section11Intro: For questions regarding these terms or our services, please contact us:
tac.closing: Your trust is our priority. Stay with CliniCall Limited and explore new horizons in health care.

callphone: Call us to get in touch
deletenote1: All your data will be permanently deleted.
deletenote2: Your account will not be recoverable after 90 days of deletion.
deletenote3: Your important information should be backed up before deleting.
deletenote4: All data will be removed according to our privacy policy.
